pros: Top-marks from crafters who make their own fridge magnets
Also great for a strong, no-nonsense fridge magnet
cons: Break or chip for some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate size
customer_reviews.text: These are ok ceramic magnets, not the strongest but not bad. The main reason for the 3 stars is that the dimensions in the description are off. I stupidly modeled and printed something based off the description while waiting for delivery only to find out the magnets aren't quite 11/16" diameter and 3/16" thickness. Using my calipers I get expected 11/16" diameter (.6875") 3/16" thickness (.1875) actual .708" diameter (17.99 mm) .198" thickness (5.02mm)
customer_reviews.author: Max Jonathan Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are incredibly strong. I have three of them on a can full of candy canes on my front door for Amazon delivery people. The can has not been knocked off with three magnets. On my refrigerator, two magnets hold a modified Altoid tin that has been highly decorated and heavier than a standard tin without decorations, stickers, and items inside. They will break however. I only lost one when unpackaging them. I do recommend rinsing them as they are dusty.
customer_reviews.author: morbin

customer_reviews.title: These magnets are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Man O Pete. This will be my 7th box of 100 purchased since Dec 2015. These little buggers have made me push my own 3D printing limits! I went from single color shapes with a magnet hole built in. And now I am creating logos, and characters, and just having a blast! Like I said... Ive made, gifted, or sold almost 600 magnets now. Everyone is happy with a handmade magnet, that ends up being better/stronger than any magnet they have dealt with on the fridge for ages!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Tofte

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with jar openers I made, so they can be hung up by the loop or just stuck to the fridge. These magnets have been perfect for my purposes. They stick to the fridge great, even through a couple layers of fabric, and they stick to my metal craft carts as well. Don't know if I'll need more since it's such a large pack, but I would buy these again if I did.
customer_reviews.author: ANM

customer_reviews.title: Strong, N side not marked
customer_reviews.text: Got these to do some medical magnet work. The north side was not marked as advertised, so I got a compass and figured it out. The smooth side without the little dimple in the middle is north. There are sure a lot of them, enough to last a lifetime, and they seem plenty strong for most any craft, office, refrigerator or body work.
customer_reviews.author: Rural ID.nurseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These magnets fit the desrcription perfectly and actually exceeded expectations for the price. They're much stronger than literally every store-bought magnet I currently have on my fridge. One magnet was able to hold over 6 layers of cardstock on my fridge without any problem (while my store-bought magnets were barely able to hold onto one birthday card!). I plan to craft my own magnets designs (by creating miniature felt creatures and gluing them to the magnets) and they are the perfect size. Big enough to be sturdy and hold onto a good amount of paper to a fridge, and yet small enough to be unobstrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Junglebird

customer_reviews.title: Good craft magnets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to glue to my spice jars so I could stick them to the fridge. I have to use a surprising number to get them to stay - between 3 and 7 per jar (for the Simply Organic spices), so it's good that there are a lot in the box. Make sure you don't accidentally get glue on them or the magnetic effect is reduced.
customer_reviews.author: randomtuesday

customer_reviews.title: Purposed
customer_reviews.text: I use the magnets to hold pictures to duct work in Basement where my Bar is ....I call it the DUCT of DOOM...lol... I also make refrigerator magnets for my friends.....I have a slough of old Dollar gaming tokens that came from Hurricane Katrina....I found them while rebuilding the Power Lines in Biloxi Mississippi...
customer_reviews.author: Katdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these magnets to put on clay medallions for a baby shower favor. They worked perfectly! The magnets are incredibly strong, which is what I was looking for since the medallions were a bit heavy. I use these in my classroom as my go-to magnets since they can hold up a lot of paper without falling down! I have had a couple of the magnets break in half when students throw them on the ground, but they stand up to normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Product as expected, no breakage.
customer_reviews.text: No breakage or anything, magnets look good and are about as strong as I expected, which isn't so strong you struggle to get it off the fridge but seems pretty sturdy. I'd say its perfect for a regular fridge magnet thats going to hold up a photo or a few sheets of paper. I'm planning on using them to make ceramic photo frames, so I will probably put 3-4 magnets on the frame to ensure it doesn't slide.
customer_reviews.author: Squiddy

customer_reviews.title: Really strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for refrigerator magnets under bottle caps. Once glued on, they stick very well, just add a felt disk to prevent scratching and they're good to go! Ed
customer_reviews.author: Ed D.

customer_reviews.title: Good magnets!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time i have brought this magnets, and once i have used the next batch i will probably buy them again. The magnets are stronge and what you would expect from a magnet this size.
customer_reviews.author: ukliz

customer_reviews.title: Great little magnets! Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: Besides the headline, not much else to say besides they're strong and durable. Perfect size for what I needed which is to clip on artwork, signs, and a banner for my display. Great value. They do have that minor magnet dust magnet on them but it wasn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Trick

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These little things are terrific! Very strong and perfect for the fridge. I'm going to try a couple of them on the shower curtain so it stops attacking me. I plan on doing something crafty with them to make cute magnets for my students for Christmas. Good value for so many too! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine7739

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my wedding invitation magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are really strong for being so tiny- I used them for my wedding invitation magnets. I got little wood slices that I painted by hand and glued these to the backs using E0006 glue. They didn't fall off, and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Useful magnets
customer_reviews.text: I use the magnets for all type of crafting. I make decorations that I usein my work cubicle and the ornaments look great and the magnets do not show. Everyone is very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY FAVAZZA

customer_reviews.title: Many uses for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly. Came as described. I was looking for something strong to hold my daughter's drawings to the refrigerator. I didn't want a bunch of tacky looking, mismatched magnets. These are the perfect size and they hold strong so the drawings don't slide down my fridge. I suppose these are made for crafting, and I may use some for a felt game I've been thinking if making because there are more than enough! Also, my daughter loves playing with magnets and these provided a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: K. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: If you're on the fence; buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Used these as weights (instead of tablecloth clips) to hold down the plastic table covers down on about 20 tables for my wedding. Worked just as I hoped! Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good and strong.
customer_reviews.text: Much stronger than the magnets in the hobby section of [large megastore]. We glue ceramics to these for fridge magnets and the other ones were not even holding up two pieces of letter sized paper. That's just not good enough. These work great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Curtain weights
customer_reviews.text: Got these to use as weights for my drapes. Put 2 together on each end and they work perfectly. Have many more than I needed but I'm sure I'll find more uses for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these in my classroom.
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my whiteboard, and they are perfect! Cheap enough that when they grow teenage legs (I teach middle school), I can replace them without too many tears, while being strong enough to hold papers, manipulatives, or other items on the board. I use them as-is, and love them. I cannot attest to their use in crafting, but based on how they work for me, I'd guess they're awesome.
customer_reviews.author: MathMama

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong Magnets
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted these for a project. They were what he needed. He let our granddaughter, with supervision, play with the extras. Now she's hooked on everything magnetic. These are small and very strong magnets. They are very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: J.P

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I create fridge magnets from bottle caps, and these are the perfect size and hold for the caps I use. I haven't moved them all to much, but they have great holding power. They may scrape the fridge finish if slid; it's not something I have tried yet but these are worth the money, given the number you get.
customer_reviews.author: B. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets for anything. Strong
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I used these to hold a door open that likes to drift closed. I glued one magnet to the door and one to the door stop. Now when I open it the door will stay locked to the wall until I actually mean to close it. Also used them to hold salt and pepper shakers to the top of my stove. Work great as fridge magnets too. Ive had none break yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a good place holder
customer_reviews.text: I'll give these a 5 star, because what I used them for worked perfectly. I put these on the sides of my windows and attached the mating magnets to my drapes. Makes for a good place holder, used hot glue without issue on them and they hold firm. To new buyers, there will be chips in the magnets from bouncing and clamping together, this by no means degrades the magnets themselves. Just letting you know, it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Heartofachampion2006

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable enough for many projects
customer_reviews.text: I bought these magnets for a toy box I made fro my daughter. They are used to hold the lid on the box, and work well. These aren't as strong as neodymium magnets, but are strong enough for many projects and are also a heck of a lot cheaper. If you're looking to make some refrigerator magnets I think they would work fine. Some ceramic magnets are very brittle and will break if dropped, but these won't. Overall, I think they're a great product, and I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hilson

customer_reviews.title: One of the simple items that all households to have around
customer_reviews.text: I use these for all kinds of things from crafts, to holding coverings in place. They are very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome magnets great product
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. So nice when you get exactly what you are looking for at a great price. Second purchase and will keep buying. Update: 9/17/2017 Still awesome magnets and the price is perfect. Order with confidence that you are getting a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Magnets
customer_reviews.text: I liked the magnets, but I needed some that were stronger than these. I used them, but they needed to be stronger for what I was hanging. I would buy again, but I would look for some that would hold heavier things.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Best Magnet I’ve Ever Bought
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time buying these. I love them. I will only buy these magnets
customer_reviews.author: The Real Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Super Strong Magnets!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased these Super strong magnets for a craft project. They were the perfect size for my clear gem refrigerator magnets. They're super strong, 1/2" durable round magnets. Highly recommend them. Very inexpensive for the quantity and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Strongest magnets ever!
customer_reviews.text: You want magnets for your refrigerator, or a magnetic board, or for any other use, buy these! They are just the right size, thickness, and believe me they are very strong. I got metallic bulletin boards and these are perfect for my uses. They get my highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Marooned

customer_reviews.title: good for making refrigerator magnets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to glue to the back of the resin medallions that come on Krewe Mardi Gras beads. I turn them into magnets by hot gluing these magnets to the back. I bought them once before and a bunch were broken but this time they are in good condition. They have a strong hold on the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lane Carleton

customer_reviews.title: which I found useful in turning something to which I had attached the ...
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are 5 mm thick and 18 mm (0.709 inch) in diameter and are surprisingly strong, much stronger than refrigerator magnets, but not as strong as rare earth magnets. They are flat on one side and have a small dimple on the other, which I found useful in turning something to which I had attached the magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Don

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good magnets for my beer cap project. I had stronger ones but couldn't find in my purchase history, so opted for these. Strong enough and perfect size. Only con was that one came partially broken and they were dirty. Not sure if it was from the broken one or something else. Overall solid buy for my projects.
customer_reviews.author: Matt T.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, strong hold
customer_reviews.text: These are perky little magnets that stick well to magnetic surfaces, and there're lots of them! They are a bit dusty as others point out, but they wipe off easily. I'd rather clean them myself than pay more for the manufacturer to clean them, so no complaints. They're great little magnets that we're using for all kinds of things.
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnets. Perfect for holding even heavy items. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed and better than the ones I've been purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price. Saved in my orders, WIll order again!!!
customer_reviews.author: _t0ni_

customer_reviews.title: Super strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are almost too strong. I hot-glued them to bottle caps to make fridge magnets and they stick so well to the fridge that they're coming unglued. I think I need stronger glue for these very strong magnets.
customer_reviews.author: abbythestabby

customer_reviews.title: Strong little magnets
customer_reviews.text: I am using these magnets in my sewing crafts. I am very impressed with the strength of them for their size. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: These were incredibly strong magnets! One easily held up 3 pieces of paper, sized 81/2x11, on the refrigerator. Unfortunately they were still a little too large for a project I was working on. Ours had no sharp edges or metal shavings, they were clean, smooth and ready for use!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Great, but dusty.
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnets. Worked perfect for my uses. They came a little dusty but that's to be expected of industrial magnets. You're buying quality here, but if you plan to use them on something fragile, or something that needs to stay clean, wash em first. Again, this isn't a bad thing as you're buying industrial strength. Just know what you're getting into when you open the box.
customer_reviews.author: CAmadeusA

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets for craft projects
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make small fridge magnets, strong enough to hold a postcard or business card to the fridge. I also used them on the back of makeup products (mascara, blush) to stick to my makeup board in the bathroom. Larger items, like my eyeshadow palette, required more magnets, but they are strong. They do have that black dust on them that other reviewers have mentioned, which is a pain to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Harper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Ordered
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered, and just right. The magnets are very strong, not wimpy little things that don't stick. Great price and came packed very compact, easy to store until needed again. I'll definitely be ordering more. A dab of Super Glue and my projects are ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnets. I purchased for a classroom Mother’s Day project and they were stronger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Turner

customer_reviews.title: Love Magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Love magnets in general! These magnets work as expected, lost of home applications :) most of them just for fun!
customer_reviews.author: Noah.Jones.Alpha

customer_reviews.title: Strong!
customer_reviews.text: It was a happy surprise at how strong these magnets are. Will continue to buy for my small art pieces. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Busse

customer_reviews.title: SRONG MAGNETS.
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are very useful on metal bulletin boards, they are also a great hobby item, I attach them to military challenge coins to display on the door of my refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Doug McElfresh

customer_reviews.title: They Work
customer_reviews.text: These are not as strong as I thought but strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get my ceiling air intake vent cover to stay shut. Ordering a new one was like rocket science so I used these magnets. They worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for bottle cap magnets
customer_reviews.text: if it were just a tad bit stronger that would help. glued these onto the back of eraser for magnets. Maybe the bulky erasers were just too heavy. They kept falling off.. so will try something other than hot glue. I think they would work well for bottle cap magnets. Good size for that.
customer_reviews.author: eclectic gatherings

customer_reviews.title: Great magnet
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are super strong and worked great for a project I made to sell in a gift shop.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S Reasons

customer_reviews.title: Versatile magnets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as weights for curtains and they do the trick! Will also use them for crafting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafts!
customer_reviews.text: These were absolutely perfect for what I needed them for. One magnet was able to hold 3 post card-like invitations, which is great considering their size. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Tucker

customer_reviews.title: ... these in my science classroom and the price is great. They were strong enough for much of what ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these in my science classroom and the price is great. They were strong enough for much of what I needed them for but I did take one star off for their tendency to shatter when dropped from a desk to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Palindrome

customer_reviews.title: Magnets hold strong
customer_reviews.text: These are really great for making refrigerator magnets. I make them with various rocks and minerals and sell them along with my rock jewelry. Always a hit with adults and kids.
customer_reviews.author: ccorden

customer_reviews.title: Handy to own-very strong
customer_reviews.text: These are very strong. I use them for different projects along with double sided sticky squares. They are holding up an insulated cover over my whole house fan for the winter. They holding up a white board to the side of a refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: C McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Durable and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a project I'm working on for my wedding. They are great and more durable than expected. It can definitely hold up a heavy item to the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: These are a nice general use magnet
customer_reviews.text: I have these all over my refrigerator and they work well and do not break. They are strong but not so strong I cannot pull them apart easily. I hang my kitchen towels and refrigerator heart with them.
customer_reviews.author: corinne

customer_reviews.title: manageable magnets
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these magnets to make some projects and they worked out well on the strength of the magnets. I was not expecting the magnet it self to fall a part and be chipped . I would recommend then if its just a home product you'll make but not for resale .
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Super strong
customer_reviews.text: I put these magnets on the back of cement letters and they hold up! So much so I purchased them a second time
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Stinson

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable magnets
customer_reviews.text: These magnets worked out great for my Christmas 2" x 2" ceramic tile photo magnets that I made. I did use 2 magnets for each tile but more for stability so that the tile doesn't turn while on the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: TINA PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Magnets!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are perfect for crafting and they actually hold papers. These are extremely affordable and they are great quality! I've purchased them twice and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ABamazon22

customer_reviews.title: Strong and useful
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these magnets are strong! I bought them for holding stencils while I airbrush, but these are so strong they could easily hold pictures in place and so on. They are an excellent value and promise to be quite useful around the house.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Can hold a lot of things to the fridge, haven't had any issues with these not being strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mattea

customer_reviews.text: Using these on my radiator covers for my daughters art. Strong and holds many pieces of construction paper at once
customer_reviews.author: Julia G. Villalon

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: These fantastic little magnets exceeded my expectations! They are small but super strong. I just needed them to hang heavy papers and cute visual objects on a white board. They really did the job!! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Julian

customer_reviews.title: Nice present for young, growing minds to play with
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 5 year old grand daughter for Christmas. She is always playing with my fridge magnets so I got these for her to play with. Strong enough to hang stuff yet not too strong to cause her little fingers any harm
customer_reviews.author: foto51dude

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: They have a dimple on on side, not that this matters but I found it helpful in making them all the same side north or south. If I put one on top of my finger and the other on the bottom, they will hold
customer_reviews.author: A. Pasquariello

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in perfect condition, are very strong, and the little divot in the center of one side makes the perfect place to put the drop of glue for attaching the magnet to a glass gem (I use Elmer's Pro Bond).
customer_reviews.author: Tori Finnin

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Never had a magnet this small with so much power
customer_reviews.author: Elroy Portis III

customer_reviews.title: they do stick together well and work better on the fridge
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as expected on the surface I intended to use it on. they do stick together well and work better on the fridge. I was hoping they would be nearly as strong as the magnets that come in phillips sonicaire toothbrush refills.
customer_reviews.author: MBB

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnets
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Have ordered twice now because they are perfect for my needs. Very strong! A touch bigger than a dime, smaller than a nickel.
customer_reviews.author: rollingblubber

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: Great value and have plenty of uses. I only need maybe 20 or so but it was worth it to get 100 because I would have ended up paying not much less for a lot fewer magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Sean F

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: I’m using these to keep oven door closed and they have held up to the heat
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: These are great, and affordable. We go through a lot of them.
customer_reviews.author: Cristie Shires

customer_reviews.title: Love little magnets!
customer_reviews.text: With a bunch of grandkids, there are always new pictures to post on the fridge. We also enjoy cruising and the magnets are great for putting excursion tickets, reminders, etc. on the cabin walls
customer_reviews.author: Grandmarolls

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Stuck a bunch of these to a knife rack that had a tenuous hold on fridge and now it's difficult to pry off! I also saw the dust some others reported but unless you're working with a craft that can't be smudged at all, it's really not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: K. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and very powerful. I use resin molds to make magnets and I sink these little suckers right into the resin. They work beautifully. Never had an issue (I've ordered 600 at this point).
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Klales

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and super fast delivery. I would definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: dmodvm

customer_reviews.title: Great hold
customer_reviews.text: I am using these to make refrigerator resin magnets and these have great hold
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids to learn Magnet and as hobby projects
customer_reviews.text: Good for kids to learn Magnet and as hobby projects. And of course they can hold papers on your refrigerator. You won't be out of magnets once you have 100 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Pravin Pathak

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Artwork
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are strong and sturdy and helped me with my art installation.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fine. One star off for not offering like 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: Fine. One star off for not offering like 30 magnets for less money. 100 must be for families with four kids.
customer_reviews.author: Hamsun

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets
customer_reviews.text: Great for crafting or for use as a simple no fuss fridge magnet. They stick to hot glue (not everything does!) so they are great for a variety of projects. Strong magnet too, very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The best I have found!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are the best! Nice and thick, study, second time buying them and will keep doing so. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: slo42790

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnets, I used them to keep the Teflon paper on my heat press and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M

customer_reviews.title: ... bought them here because you get more for a good price than an actual store like Walmart
customer_reviews.text: I bought them here because you get more for a good price than an actual store like Walmart. I make bottle cap magnets, but I have to double them up. So instead of 100 possible bottle cap magnets, I get 50.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki2Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafting etc
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Lots of magnets at a cheap price. I'm going to be gluing inside an armoire to hold my earrings and keep them organized. Great for crafting etc.
customer_reviews.author: Denise in Yorktown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars These magnets hold strong and don't flake!
customer_reviews.text: these are solid magnets with a strong pull great for craft magnets. They can hold up a heavier item.
customer_reviews.author: bz

customer_reviews.title: LOVED these
customer_reviews.text: used these for my wedding and another art project. Magnet is very strong
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Calagna

customer_reviews.title: They were smaller than I expected. Not the sellers ...
customer_reviews.text: They were smaller than I expected. Not the sellers fault. I was going to try to use them to weigh down shower curtain but it didn't work. Don't really have another use for them so I guess the kids can play with them.
customer_reviews.author: ncwarde

customer_reviews.title: I have magnetic walls in my classroom and these actually ...
customer_reviews.text: I have magnetic walls in my classroom and these actually hold up posters and make changing out student work a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: To repeat, they are strong! I use them for curtain pleats and shower curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use these magnets in my classroom and love them. I use hot glue to attach them ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these magnets in my classroom and love them. I use hot glue to attach them to various things and have been very impressed with their strength. I had a packet I send home with parents for Meet the Teacher night that was about 12 pages thick. One of these magnets on the back made it perfect for hanging on a fridge. They also work great for gluing on to nametags to create magnetic name tags. They are very strong magnets!
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Song

customer_reviews.title: Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Decent little magnets. Each one is about the size of a dime. Stronger than I expected. I use them for photos and documents.

customer_reviews.text: Great set of magnets. They are pretty thick..but really strong.

customer_reviews.text: Love these. This is my second order of these. There super heavy duty great for my crafts. Got to house super fast in mint condition.

customer_reviews.title: Good quailty magnets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use as curtain weights on outdoor patio curtains. They work very well. They are very strong magnets. Excellent!

product_meta.title: Creative Hobbies Industrial Ceramic Circle Magnets 11/16 Inch Flat - 18mm Round Disc - 3/16" Thick - Ferrite Magnets Bulk for Crafts, Science & Hobbies, Refrigerator or Whiteboard - 100 pcs/Box!
feature_bullets: ✔️ Creative Hobbies Grade 5 Ceramic Disc Magnets are strong and measure 11/16 Inch (.709" or 18mm) Round x 3/16" (.198" or 5mm) Thick (50% Stronger & Thicker than competitors)
✔️ BEST SELLER - These Strong Magnets are Great for all home, office, craft, hobby, science projects and product manufacturing applications
✔️ HIGHEST QUALITY - Flat Circle Magnets with Beveled Edges to protect surfaces from scratching like other inferior brands do
✔️ NORTH POLE MARKED - So you can apply the magnet easily to the correct side. These make great refrigerator magnets or whiteboard magnets
✔️ WE ARE A USA OWNED AND BASED SELLER!
